channel.title: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help
channel.description: Hey guys, i'm giving a friend my source but, i don't want him to say it's his work. what shall i do? i want to make it so if he bans me or does anything then, i can do something to him so he can't do anything. Hard to explain! help :p

item.title: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Just don’t give it if you don’t trust him.

Read full topic
item.source: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help

item.title: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You can always decompile the class files and get Java files. I do it with some clients to mess with leeched servers to have some fun lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help

item.title: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Well if he was a loyal and good friend you wouldn’t be asking this, i suggest that you just give it to him if you trust him, if you don’t then don’t bother…And if its a must then i suggest you put a password or do what runescape sucks said. Both idea’s will work.

Read full topic
item.source: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help

item.title: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Make a case in all the ban and mutes etc. that if you ban or mute your name, it won’t happen. Then compile and delete the .java files. If you ever need to update, just send him .class files of what’s being updated.

If you do this, do not delete your original .java files, make a new copy

Read full topic
item.source: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help

item.title: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Give him it or don’t.

You shouldn’t be the way you are. You either fully give it and if your going to do that he should respect you enough to do as you ask. Don’t give it to him if you think otherwise.

Read full topic
item.source: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help

item.title: Pi giving someone my source i worked on and need help
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

put a password on the files. If hes a rank in your server then take it away

Read full topic
